website_summaries.verdict: Spotify's excellent Android app delivers on nearly all fronts, with excellent audio, gapless playback, collaborative playlists, and new features for runners.
cons: Lacks Slacker Radio's optional informative DJs
Isn't compatible with .MP3 files like the PC version
